categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic repulsorcraft

nodes.text: The snowspeeder was a type of T-47 airspeeder manufactured by Incom Corporation and modified by the Rebel Alliance. They saw use during the Battle of Hoth against the Galactic Empire, taking down Imperial All Terrain Armored Transports with their tow cables.
The snowspeeders first appeared in the Star Wars saga film Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back.
